results.description: Required base columns present in events_20250223.csv
At least one identity column exists (client_id or clientId)
No unknown event_name values (contract enforcement)
event_data JSON parse success rate (should be >99%)
Timestamps parse and align to partition date (allow small late/early spillover)
Referrer column exists (used for attribution/channel classification)
Client identity completeness (coalesced client_id/clientId)
Purchases have transaction_id, revenue>0, and non-empty items (small counts quarantined; systemic blocks)
No transaction_id collisions (same tx used for different purchase payloads)
No duplicate purchase events with same transaction_id and identical payload (double-count risk)
